name: DriftFox
description:
In this space navigation ring collecting catastrophe you steer a ship with hideously inefficient controls to gather as many rings as you can, as fast as you can.

WARNING: Do not play if you get easily sea sick.

Controls: (I would highly suggest a 360 Controller)

Controller: 

- Sticks control engine direction

- Triggers control thrust

Keyboard: 

Wasd: Left Engine Control

Arrow Keys: Right Engine Control

Space Bar: Left Engine Thrust

Right Ctrl: Right Engine Thrust
